vibe.user_input: I want to build an online booking system for my yoga studio. Students can browse class schedule, book classes online, pay with Stripe (one-time payment per class), admin can manage schedule, email confirmations. Target launch: 8 weeks, Budget: $15k, Team: Solo developer

status.message: Golden Path Test - Testing Prompt Registry with Guardian Directives
